ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I stake on Ndax - desktop

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Log in to your Ndax account. 2. Click Staking from the left-hand menu. 3. Choose the asset you'd like to stake and click Stake. 4. Select a staking plan and enter the amount to stake. 5. Click Continue. 6. Review the plan details and click Start Staking.
Please note that there is a bonding period between 1-3 days. Once the bonding period is complete, your crypto will begin earning rewards!
